1.content: Get Stripe API keys from user
1.details: Collect the Stripe publishable key, secret key, and product IDs from the user's Stripe dashboard to enable subscription integration.

2.content: Build Public Insurance Adjuster CRM with Stripe Integration
2.details: Develop a full-stack CRM application including: 1) User authentication & role management (Assignable Users, Admin Users, Office Staff, Sales) 2) Stripe subscription management 3) Claims management system 4) Client portal 5) Document storage with 1TB per assignable user limits 6) Email automations 7) Reporting and analytics 8) Team collaboration tools

3.content: Deploy and test the complete CRM system
3.details: Deploy the application, test all subscription tiers, verify role-based access controls, and ensure Stripe integration works correctly for billing and user limits.
